name: Overthrone
description:
Disclaimer: Hordation is still in development and we plan to release it in  August. It will have a top-down view with 3D assets in a creepy and twisted environment with the goal being not only to survive the waves but also to damage your overlord enough to steal their powers!

You play as a cultist vying for your overlords powers, they're weak right now but not weak enough for you to get the upper hand. Make it seem like you're defending them while letting your enemies do the work for you then at the right time, strike them down.

Determine what towers you need to upgrade and what plots you need to hot swap towers to in real time to be able to lower the overlords health just enough, keeping in mind you still need them alive to kill them later!

Controls:

All elements will be controlled by left clicking the mouse then clicking the appropriate area or object.
